Basic Usage¶

Uploading a single sequencing run¶

  1. Click the “Choose directory” button.
  1. Select the directory containing the SampleSheet.csv file.

3. If the SampleSheet.csv in the directory you selected is valid then the upload button will be displayed. If you see an error then see Handling Errors for more information.

  1. Click the upload button to start uploading.
  1. The upload should start in a few seconds depending on your internet speed and provide you with an estimated time until it completes.

Uploading multiple sequencing runs¶

This is very similar to the steps in Uploading a single sequencing run except for Step 2. For Step 2: Select the directory containing the sub-directories that have the SampleSheet.csv files.

Add image showing

dir_to_select
